sentences.en: ...percussion instruments, redolent of Far Eastern cultures.
sentences.cn: ...使人联想到了远东文化的打击乐器。

sentences.en: an atmosphere redolent of the sea and ships
sentences.cn: 让人联想起大海和船只的氛围

sentences.en: Her artificial world was redolent of orchids and pleasant , cheerful snobbery.
sentences.cn: 她那人为的世界充满了兰花, 愉快的势力风尚.

sentences.en: His image is redolent of the smell of old leather, old money and class.
sentences.cn: 他的形象使人联想起旧皮革的气味 、 旧钞票和等级.
她带进来一股刺鼻的香风.

sentences.en: Soon, patchouli redolent shawls become fashionable in the 19th century France, paralleling the rise of patchouli as a fragrance ingredient.
sentences.cn: 很快，散发着广藿香芬芳的羊毛披肩在19世纪的法国流行了开来，带动了将广藿香作为原始香材使用的风潮。

sentences.en: The actions of this singer are redolent of the style of a master.
sentences.cn: 这位歌手的举手投足真有大家风范.

sentences.en: The castle is redolent of the past.
The hall was redolent of floor wax.
sentences.cn: 这个大厅有地板蜡的芳香味.

sentences.en: The kitchen was redolent of onions.
The kitchen was redolent with the peculiar aromatic odor of cloves.
sentences.cn: 厨房充满了特殊的丁香气味.

sentences.en: The most conspicuous feature here seems to be the plateau that surrounds the village: a context more redolent of the Black Forest.
sentences.cn: 这里最显著的特征就是高地围绕在村子周围，黑森林散发着浓烈的清香，让这里犹如在仙境一般。

sentences.en: The pine woods were more redolent.
Their own yard is redolent with lilacs.
sentences.cn: 他们家自己的院子里散发着丁香花的芬芳.

words.tran_cn: 芬芳的；有…香味的；令人想起…的

trans.tran_cn: 有强烈气味的，使人联想或回想起某事物的
